update sys_setting_history set `key` = #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `value` = #{value,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, read_only = #{readOnly,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, change_remark = #{changeRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, change_admin_id = #{changeAdminId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, change_time = #{changeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select * from sys_setting_history
and `key` = #{key}
and `value` like concat('%', #{value}, '%')
order by id desc
